name: Life in the Vortex
description: Life in the Vortex is a first in a series of creative NFT software titled philosophical tools. The software allows uses your desktop or phone camera to manipulate the vortex in real-time. Control the software with a series of controls, that allow you to explore video feedback with zoom, x drifting, y drifting, key thresholds, key inversion, and b&w mode. Minimize the controls by clicking on the software title.
